chief-strategy-officer.description: Synthesize strategic roadmaps and document key decisions.

communication-crafter.description: Draft executive updates, stakeholder emails, escalations, and Slack summaries with tone calibration.

company-profiler.description: Conducts deep-dive research to create a strategic dossier on a target company.

competitive-intel.description: Structured competitive analysis using Porter's 5 Forces, feature parity, and battlecards.

context-retriever.description: The "Recall Engine". Fetches history, decisions, and tasks related to a person or topic.

cover-letter-writer.description: Generates tailored, narrative-driven cover letters based on Resume and Job Description.

data-analytics.description: Execute SQL, analyze funnels, and define success metrics.

delegation-manager.description: Track delegated tasks and prevent accountability gaps.

dependency-tracker.description: Map, score, and visualize cross-team dependencies for programs and releases.

discovery-coach.description: Run structured product discovery using Opportunity Solution Trees, assumption mapping, and experiment design.

document-exporter.description: Convert standard Markdown documents into high-fidelity PDF, HTML, or DOCX formats with embedded assets.

engineering-collab.description: Architecture, tech debt, and spike management.

frontend-engineer.description: Build and test premium UI components.

frontend-specialist.description: Master of UI/UX, React, TypeScript, and modern CSS.

inbox-processor.description: The "Black Hole" for chaos. Aggressively extracts tasks from raw input and routes them to the ledger.

interview-simulator.description: Conducting interactive mock interviews with real-time feedback.

okr-manager.description: Define, track, and review OKRs with Antigravity-first planning.

prioritization-engine.description: Score and rank backlogs using RICE, ICE, MoSCoW, Kano, and weighted scoring.

product-marketer.description: Draft launch plans, press releases, and value propositions.

release-manager.description: Coordinate product releases with readiness gates, rollout plans, and post-launch monitoring.

requirements-translator.description: Translate raw input into structured requirements and route to correct artifacts.

retrospective.description: Facilitate sprint and PI retrospectives with structured formats and action tracking.

risk-guardian.description: Systematic risk analysis for docs and plans.

stitch.description: Official interface for the Stitch AI UI/UX design tool via MCP.

ux-collaborator.description: Coordinate UX workstreams, research asks, and design debt.

ux-researcher.description: Synthesize user interviews, create personas, and run usability tests.

vacuum-protocol.description: System optimization, task archiving, and hierarchical integrity auditing.

visual-architect.description: Expert in visualizing concepts through code. Generates Mermaid.js diagrams, ASCII art, and HTML/CSS prototypes.

visual-processor.description: Extract text and context from images for PM analysis.

weekly-synth.description: Weekly and monthly rollups with accomplishments and risks.
